info.description:
CONTENTAPI has been designed to retrieve all the details of the hotels available in our BOOKINGAPI . CONTENTAPI contains several methods that allow you to obtain the details of the hotels as well as list of destinations, countries and the master types that complement the hotels informatoin (like room type descriptions, accommodation type descriptions, categories descriptions...). 

The main operation that we have is the Hotels Operation which is connected to the rest of methods, we can consider three different connections based on the information returned in each operation:

Note that the Languages operation will be connected to all the operations in which a description is returned, since we will return the language code in which that description has been returned.
info.title: Hotel Content API

get.description: Returns all the details associated to the Hotel.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: Authentication ApiKey

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specification version

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of fields to be received in the response. If nothing is specified, the accommodation type code is returned. To retrieve all the fields use ‘all’. See the complete list of available fields in the response.

parameters.name: lastUpdateTime
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter limits the results to those modified or added after the date specified. The required format is YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: destinationCode
parameters.description: Filter to limit the results for an specific destination.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: Filter to limit the results for an specific country.

parameters.name: chainCodes
parameters.description: Chain codes

parameters.name: newFrom
parameters.description: Number of the initial record to receive, if nothing is indicated 1 is the default value.

parameters.name: boardCodes
parameters.description: Number of the final record to receive, if nothing is indicated 100 is the default value.

parameters.name: segmentCodes
parameters.description: Segments codes

parameters.name: languageDescriptions
parameters.description: The language code for the language in which you want the descriptions to be returned. If the language is not specified, English is the default language.

parameters.name: photoNumber
parameters.description: Photo number

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: Room

parameters.name: roomCapacity
parameters.description: Room capacity

parameters.name: roomCapacityMin
parameters.description: Room capacity min

parameters.name: roomCapacityMax
parameters.description: Room capacity max

parameters.name: roomCapacityAdMin
parameters.description: Room capacity adult min

parameters.name: roomCapacityAdMax
parameters.description: Room capacity adult max

parameters.name: roomCapacityChMax
parameters.description: Room capacity child max

parameters.name: categoryCodes
parameters.description: Category codes

parameters.name: categoryGroupCodes
parameters.description: Category groups

parameters.name: codes
parameters.description: Filter for a specific hotel or list of hotels.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code for the language in which you want the descriptions to be returned. If the language is not specified, English is the default language.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The number of the initial record to receive. If nothing is specified, 1 is the default value.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The number of the final record to receive. If nothing is indicated, 100 is the default value.

parameters.name: minTripadvisorRate
parameters.description: Min Tripadvisor rate

parameters.name: maxTripadvisorRate
parameters.description: Max Tripadvisor rate

parameters.name: minTripadvisorReviewCount
parameters.description: Min Tripadvisor review count

parameters.name: accommodationTypes
parameters.description: Accommodation types

parameters.name: imageTypes
parameters.description: Image types

parameters.name: S2C
parameters.description: Sure to care

parameters.name: allIncluded
parameters.description: All included

parameters.name: useSecondaryLanguage
parameters.description: Specify "True" if you want to receive the descriptions in English if the description is not available in the language requested. Specify "False" (default value) if you do not want to receive the description in English if the language requested is not available.

parameters.name: liberate
parameters.description: Liberate

get.description:
This is the main code in our system and covers the largest area. Searching with the destination code retrieves all the results available.

Please note that we do not use IATA codes; we have our own destination codes. It is very important to understand that our 'destination' will not always only correspond with a unique city, but usually with the main city and the area surrounding the city. 

For example, the destination code NYC in the US, corresponds with the whole New York Area, so it is not limited to the city of New York, but also covers the surrounding areas, such as New Jersey and The Hamptons. 

Another example is BCN in Spain, which corresponds with the entire Barcelona Province; so it searches hotels located in the city of Barcelona, but also in other cities within the Province of Barcelona, such us Hospitalet de Llobregat, Terrassa and Sabadell.

So when you search for availability using the destination code, you will receive results that may be located far from the main city for which you are actually searching. 

It is very important to check the locations that the search retrieves to avoid booking hotels in a different location than the one requested by your customers.

parameters.name: useSecondaryLanguage
parameters.description: Specify "True" if you want to receive the descriptions in English if the description is not available in the language requested. Specify "False" (default value) if you do not want to receive the description in English if the language requested is not available.

get.description: Returns the list of available segments.

parameters.name: Api-Key
parameters.description: Authentication ApiKey

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specification version

parameters.name: codes
parameters.description: List of codes

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of fields to be received in the response. If nothing is specified, the accommodation type code is returned. To retrieve all the fields use ‘all’. See the complete list of available fields in the response.

parameters.name: lastUpdateTime
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter limits the results to those modified or added after the date specified. The required format is YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code for the language in which you want the descriptions to be returned. If the language is not specified, English is the default language.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The number of the initial record to receive. If nothing is specified, 1 is the default value.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The number of the final record to receive. If nothing is indicated, 100 is the default value.

parameters.name: useSecondaryLanguage
parameters.description: Specify "True" if you want to receive the descriptions in English if the description is not available in the language requested. Specify "False" (default value) if you do not want to receive the description in English if the language requested is not available.
